instruction: Compose a short story about two friends from different walks of life.
output: John and Lorraine were two friends from different walks of life. John was from a poor family, while Lorraine was from a wealthy background. Despite their upbringing, the two quickly clicked and became inseparable. They would sneak away from their homes and explore the city together, getting lost in its streets. During their adventures, they saw the similarities between themselves and the beauty of the different perspectives each one had. They never forgot the lessons they learned from each other and their friendship was enhanced forever.
